language.description: Python is a versatile, high-level programming language known for its readability and simplicity. It is widely used in web development, scientific computing, artificial intelligence, and more.
JavaScript is a dynamic programming language primarily used for web development. It allows interactive elements on websites and is essential for front-end and back-end web development.
Java is a robust, object-oriented programming language used for developing desktop, web, and mobile applications. It is known for its platform independence and scalability.
C# (C Sharp) is a versatile programming language developed by Microsoft. It is used for building Windows applications, web services, and games using the .NET framework.
PHP is a server-side scripting language designed for web development. It can be embedded into HTML and is used to create dynamic web pages and web applications.
C++ is a powerful, general-purpose programming language based on C. It is widely used for systems software, game development, and applications requiring high performance.
SQL (Structured Query Language) is a language used to manage and manipulate databases. It is essential for storing, manipulating, and retrieving data in relational databases.
R is a programming language and software environment used for statistical computing and graphics. It is widely used among statisticians and data miners for data analysis.
Swift is a powerful and intuitive programming language created by Apple for macOS, iOS, watchOS, and tvOS development. It is designed to work seamlessly with Apple's frameworks.
